document.full_text: eddie avila, a high school senior at belvidere north in illinois, had a leg amputated after a wrestling accident, and his response has made him a hometown hero.
document.title: chicago news cooperative: after amputation, wrestler tries to ease rival?s pain
lines_and_colors: eddie avila, a high school senior at belvidere north in illinois, had a leg amputated after a wrestling accident, and his response has made him a hometown hero.
